"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media handling\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case if Customer information is physically transported outside the perimeter, then appropriate protection must be in place (e.g., anti-tamper packaging, etc.)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Removable media must be placed in lockable storage and secured overnight\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Media pertaining or relating to the services delivered to Customer are strictly controlled and allowed to be accessed only by authorized team members\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All paper records/printouts must be shredded when no longer needed\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Laptops\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Customer laptops are allowed in perimeter and only temporarily upon special approval from Customer responsible person signed on paper\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
